video.name: CAJUN TOFU WITH CILANTRO LIME RICE | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Cajun Tofu Bowl with Cilantro Lime Rice, Veggies, & From scratch Cajun Blend. . 
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/09/cajun-tofu-with-cilantro-lime-rice.html
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡MY COOKBOOK: https://veganricha.com/vrekaz

I go through weeks where I will obsess about one particular spice blend or combination. This past few months have been about Cajun, my own homemade seasoning. Exhibit 1- Cajun Cauliflower over Garlic pasta, so Good!, exhibit 2- Cajun Spiced Sloppy lentils, oh my gosh! (both recipes are on the blog veganricha.com)

This week serve up this easy Cajun Tofu Bowl however you want it, but make some! The Tofu is rubbed up with Cajun spice blend and lime pasta or make a marinade, then baked. Meanwhile, make the other bowl components like a refreshing cilantro lime rice. Add roasted veggies, chopped up tomato/crunchy veggies or pico de gallo, some greens or lettuce. Slice the baked tofu and serve. You can use the cajun blend paste over chickpea tofu, chickpeas/beans or hearty vegetables as cauliflower, eggplant, sweet potato, zucchini and roast them until tender and use those in the bowl instead of tofu for soy-free
Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Recipe.

recipeIngredient: 1.5 to 2 tbsp cajun spice blend (, see note)
1 cup long grain rice or basmati rice
crunchy greens, chopped tomato or cucumber,  lime juice

recipeInstructions.text: Press the tofu (wrap in paper towel, then kitchen towel and place a couple of heavy books on it for 15 minutes or use a tofu press). Then slice into 1/4 inch thick slices. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the tofu (wrap in paper towel, then kitchen towel and place a couple of heavy books on it for 15 minutes or use a tofu press). Then slice into 1/4 inch thick slices. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the cajun spices with lime juice, olive oil and salt to make a paste. Rub the cajun paste on the tofu and let it chill for at least 15 mins (to an hour) to pick up the flavor.  * See Note.. Alternatively, toss the tofu (in cubes form) in olive oil, then toss in dry cajun spice blend + salt. (Drizzle lime juice later after baking).
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the cajun spices with lime juice, olive oil and salt to make a paste. Rub the cajun paste on the tofu and let it chill for at least 15 mins (to an hour) to pick up the flavor.  * See Note.. Alternatively, toss the tofu (in cubes form) in olive oil, then toss in dry cajun spice blend + salt. (Drizzle lime juice later after baking).

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the Tofu at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes.  Cool for a few minutes, then slice and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the Tofu at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes.  Cool for a few minutes, then slice and serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, make the cilantro lime rice: Wash and soak the rice for atleast 15 minutes. (I usually do this along with tofu pressing, so the rice and tofu are ready around the same time).
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, make the cilantro lime rice: Wash and soak the rice for atleast 15 minutes. (I usually do this along with tofu pressing, so the rice and tofu are ready around the same time).

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the rice and add to the saucepan. Add salt, water, and oil if using and mix in. You can also add in a bay leaf.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the rice and add to the saucepan. Add salt, water, and oil if using and mix in. You can also add in a bay leaf.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to medium-low and cook covered for 18 to 20 minutes. Fluff the rice, mix in lime juice and half the cilantro. Taste and adjust carefully. Cover and let sit for 2 minutes. Garnish with more cilantro when serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat to medium-low and cook covered for 18 to 20 minutes. Fluff the rice, mix in lime juice and half the cilantro. Taste and adjust carefully. Cover and let sit for 2 minutes. Garnish with more cilantro when serving.

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble crunchy greens or lettuce cilantro lime rice, sliced tofu, chopped tomato and a good drizzle of lime or lemon, salt and freshly ground pepper. Serve as a bowl or fill up warm tortillas for great tacos.
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble crunchy greens or lettuce cilantro lime rice, sliced tofu, chopped tomato and a good drizzle of lime or lemon, salt and freshly ground pepper. Serve as a bowl or fill up warm tortillas for great tacos.
